haze.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: smoke, dust, or mist in the air which is difficult to see through
haze.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The sun was surrounded by a golden haze.
haze.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the feeling of being very confused and unable to think clearly
haze.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to play tricks on a new student or to make them do silly or dangerous things, as part of joining the school or a club at the school
